name: Introspection (Astrallex | Astronomical Projects)
description:
You are a neuronaut, who is exploring the depths of a familiar yet unknown mind, with a vague recollection that your mission was to get to the centre of this mind maze. You don’t quite remember who you are or why you’re here, but you’re hoping that you’ll find that out on the way.

This is a 3D platforming game with each ability being reminiscent of different mental problems, and how to overcome them, such as anger and loneliness.
